MetaData.MetaDataItem: 1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network. 2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the program button to add it in the network.
Quickly press the button three (3) times, then press and hold the button for at least three (3) seconds. The LED will blink five (5) times to confirm.

1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave network. 2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the manual/program button to remove it from the network.
The Honeywell Z-Wave Tamper Resistant Outlet enables wireless control of on/off functions from the Z-Wave controlled outlet

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/Products/2690/XML

Value.label: LED Light
Value.Help: Sets when the LED on the outlet is lit.

Group.label: Supports Basic Set and is controlled with the local load
Supports Basic Set and is controlled by pressing the On or Off button
